document.masterDocTitle: New Records of ground beetles for Colombia (Coleoptera: Carabidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New Records of ground beetles for Colombia (Coleoptera: Carabidae)

subSubSection.paragraph: Comments. Genus of world distribution, introduced, with two species in America from Canada , United States , Chile and Perú , Islas Juan Fernández and Tierra del Fuego. First record for Colombia .

Material examined. COLOMBIA .

Comments. Species of world distribution, introduced, with the same distribution of the genus. First record for Colombia .
